sentences.en: But they seem to be becoming more ornery.
sentences.cn: 然而他们看起来脾气变得越来越大.

sentences.en: I got to go to church and sweat and sweat -- I hate them ornery sermons!
sentences.cn: 我还得去做礼拜,弄得浑身是汗 —— 我恨那些一文不值的布道辞!

sentences.en: I'm nasty, I'm old, and a little bit ornery.
sentences.cn: 我有点儿惹人讨厌, 岁数又大,还有点爱唠叨.

sentences.en: It is mostly because we're mean and ornery.
sentences.cn: 多半是因为我们小心眼,有点固执.

sentences.en: It's aid that Lao ornery good terms with the minister.
sentences.cn: 据说老张和那个部长的关系特别好.

sentences.en: Nathan is so ornery in the morning that he never answers his phone.
sentences.cn: 纳单早上情绪最差,他从来不接电话.

sentences.en: On top of that, the tools themselves were almost universally immature and ornery.
sentences.cn: 其中最严重的是, 这些工具几乎普遍都不够成熟,性能也一般.

sentences.en: The first three med students are ornery because they have been waiting for 11 minutes.
sentences.cn: 前三个医学学生很生气,因为他们等了我十一分钟了.

sentences.en: When he was 16 when is ornery shoots carves the hero!
sentences.cn: 当他十六岁时已是威名远播的射雕英雄了!

words.tran_cn: 不合作；故意刁难（ornery的名词）
